docs.text: Transform GUI Installation Insert this model into ReplicatedStorage. Basic Usage Create a ScreenGui inside StarterGui with a Frame inside. Create a LocalScript and add the following code. local TransformGui = require(game.ReplicatedStorage.TransformGui) local tGui = TransformGui.new(script.Parent.Frame, false) tGui:makeDraggable() The code should make the GUI draggable with your mouse. If this works then you're all set to go.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Create a ScreenGui inside StarterGui with a Frame inside. Create a LocalScript and add the following code. local TransformGui = require(game.ReplicatedStorage.TransformGui) local tGui = TransformGui.new(script.Parent.Frame, false) tGui:makeDraggable() The code should make the GUI draggable with your mouse. If this works then you're all set to go.
docs.title: Basic Usage

docs.text: TransformGui Methods new Description: Creates the TransformGui class. Params: guiObject: the gui object that you want the module to control. ignoreGuiInsetEnabled: whether the ScreenGui's IgnoreGuiInset property is enabled. local TransformGui = require(game.ReplicatedStorage.TransformableGui, false) TransformGui.new(script.Parent.Frame, false) makeDraggable Description: Enables the TransformGui object to be moved with the mouse. TransformGui.makeDraggable() makeResizeable Description: Enables the TransformGui object to be resized from the edges. TransformGui.makeDraggable() Events onDragBegin Description: Fires when the user starts dragging the guiObject. TransformGui.onDragBegin:Connect(function() end) Events onDragEnded Description: Fires when the user finishes dragging the guiObject. TransformGui.onDragEnded:Connect(function() end) onResizeBegin Description: Fires when the user starts resizing the guiObject. TransformGui.onResizeBegin:Connect(function() end) Events onResizeEnded Description: Fires when the user finishes resizing the guiObject. TransformGui.onResizeEnded:Connect(function() end)
docs.title: TransformGUI
